name: Ice Cream Sticky Buns
author: dave
summary: This recipe always goes over great at our house. The kids love to eat them warm right out of the oven.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) package frozen dinner rolls, thawed
directions: Arrange rolls in a 9x13-inch baking dish
Heat ice cream, butter, white sugar, and brown sugar in a saucepan over medium heat until ice cream is melted, sugars are dissolved, and sauce is warm, about 5 minutes; pour mixture over bread dough
Cover and let rise in a warm area until doubled, about 1 hour
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Bake in preheated oven until rolls are golden brown, about 30 minutes
